name: MaineStateLottery
0:
”Alexa open maine lottery”
”Powerball”
”alexa ask maine lottery winning numbers for powerball”
skdetail:
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: maine lottery
des: Don’t miss a single lottery drawing by downloading the Maine Lottery Echo Skill today! Open the skill by saying “Alexa, launch Maine Lottery” and discover if you’re a winner! Determine the winning numbers for all of your favorite games, including Powerball and Megabucks! Example: “Alexa, tell me the winning numbers for Pick 4”. Winning numbers are updated at different days and times for each game, so make sure to check back often. Exit the Skill by saying “Alexa, Stop”.
